text: Novourusovka () is a rural locality (a selo) and the administrative center of Buzansky Selsoviet, Krasnoyarsky District, Astrakhan Oblast, Russia. The population was 1,145 as of 2010. There are 24 streets. == Geography == It is located 43 km north-west from Krasny Yar. == References == Category:Rural localities in Krasnoyarsky District, Astrakhan Oblast
title: Novourusovka
